column2: "Right when I found Echo, I ran into <%me> as well. Talk about coincidences."
"I was the one who found you, Zeno!"
"Keep telling yourself that. <%me>, how have you been doing?"
"I've been wondering, Zeno... don't you think you're too easy on <%me>?"
"Really? This is just how a mentor treats his pupil."
"Even on that level, you're way too nice. Don't you think so, <%me>?"
"But I'm just following the example that our teacher set for us."
"Don't tell me... Echo, are you jealous?"
